module.name: Queue Priorities
module.description: Adds the ability to set a callers priority higher before entering a queue
module.changelog: *13.0.8* Packaging of ver 13.0.8 *13.0.7* FREEI-924 Fix XSS Bootstrap Datatable Issues *13.0.6* Fixing FREEPBX-17867 *13.0.5* FREEPBX-18351 After adding/editing a Queue Priority entry the page is not redirecting to list page *13.0.4* FREEPBX-15215 Multiple Queue Priority can be added with same Description *13.0.3* FREEPBX-15555 Exception Asterisk is not connected error issue fix *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha1* Visual updates *2.11.0.2* Add license file *2.11.0.1* Database Abstraction Layer Fixes *2.11.0.0* #6051 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.1* set repository *2.9.0.0* #4655
